name: A Murder on Brackey Street
description:
!PLEASE CLICK THE BLUE FULLSCREEN BUTTON!

Can you collect clues, interrigate suspect and lay connections to find the killer of John? Try this game and test your skill of logic thinking. ! 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move 

E - Interact when close to an interactable. 

This game has been made for the Brackey's 2022.2 Game Jam!

The theme of this jam was:  You are not alone. 

I have implemented this theme by adding a murderer to this scene. So you are not alone... there is a murderer among you!
